籤詩版本二:
Remember to speak frankly
Don't seek other skills in other places
You must stick to your old career
Other than that, everything else is unfavorable
詩意: This hexagram is a sign of being conservative and punctual. It's good to be conservative in everything.
解曰: Live and stay. Desirable and successful. Don't do anything else. Just be conservative.
籤詩故事一:
◇King Wen asked for divination
King Wen of Zhou Dynasty was good at divination. King Zhou summoned him at that time. King Wen calculated that this trip was unlucky and would bring seven years of bad luck, so he solemnly told his eldest son, Boyi, to govern Qi (name of place) according to the law and not to go outside.
Later, King Wen was put under house arrest by King Zhou in Youli (name of place).
At that time, King Wen's eldest son went to save his father, but was killed because he forgot his father's instructions.
聖意:
The house is normal.
Self-disadvantage.
Seek wealth and good luck.
Transaction completed.
Marriage is hindered.
Liujia: Shocked.
Pedestrian: Late.
Tiancan: Five points.


Six animals are damaged.
Looking for someone to meet.
Litigation loss.
Migration. Conservatism.
Lost things are bad.
Disease is not good.
The mountain tomb should be changed.
